verbose_text: In addition, the downregulation of HAS and CD44 blocked the TGF-beta1-induced activation of the EGFR pathway, presented as a decrease in the phosphorylation levels of AKT and ERK, and reversed EMT.
evidence: CD44 blocked the TGF-beta1-induced activation of the EGFR pathway, presented as a decrease in the phosphorylation levels of AKT and ERK, and reversed EMT
